00041 
00042 if (isset($_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'])) {
00043     header('Location: /index.php');
00044     exit(1);
00045 }
00046 
00047 // chdir is for libraries
00048 chdir(dirname(__FILE__));
00049 
00050 $ROOT= dirname(dirname(__FILE__));
00051 $VIEW_PATH= $ROOT.'/View/';
00052 
00053 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/setup.php');
00055 $LOG_LEVEL= LOG_DEBUG;
00056 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/defs.php');
00057 
00058 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'lib/libauth.php');
00059 
00060 $Auto= FALSE;
00061 $FirstBoot= FALSE;
00062 if ($_SERVER['argv'][1]) {
00063     if ($_SERVER['argv'][1] == '-a') {
00064         $Auto= TRUE;
00065     }
00066     else if ($_SERVER['argv'][1] == '-f') {
00067         $Auto= TRUE;
00068         $FirstBoot= TRUE;
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 require_once('lib.php');
00073 
00074 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'lib/view.php');
00075 $View= new View();
00076 $View->Model= 'system';
00077 
00078 if ($View->Controller($Output, 'GetConfig')) {
00079     $Config= unserialize($Output[0]);
00080 
00081     if (InitIfs()) {
00082         if (!$Auto) {
00083             GetIfSelection();
00084             SetWuiPasswd();
00085         }
00086         
00087         if (ApplyConfig()) {
00088             $msg= 'Successfully configured the system';
00089             echo $msg.".\n";
00090             cwwui_syslog(LOG_INFO, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, $msg);
00091             
00092             if ($FirstBoot) {
00093                 FirstBootTasks();
00094             }
00095             exit(0);
00096         }
00097         else {
00098             cwwui_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Failed applying configuration');
00099         }
00100     }
00101 }
00102 else {
00103     cwwui_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Cannot get configuration');
00104 }
00105 
00106 cwwui_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Configuration failed');
00107 exit(1);
00108 ?>
